name: dvnl_2022
title: DMSP-like VIIRS Nighttime Lights
description: Conversion of VIIRS NTL product original radiance measurements to DMSP digital numbers

extract_types_info.max: maximum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.sum: sum of values measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Nechaev, D.; Zhizhin, M.; Poyda, A.; Ghosh, T.; Hsu, F.-C.; Elvidge, C. Cross-Sensor Nighttime Lights Image Calibration for DMSP/OLS and SNPP/VIIRS with Residual U-Net. Remote Sens. 2021, 13, 5026.
extras.sources_name: The Colorado School of Mines Earth Observation Group
